projectdata.name: Sunnyside Agency Website
projectdata.description: An in-progress agency landing page built with React, focusing on practicing Flexbox layouts and the development of reusable components for efficient and scalable code.

projectdata.name: Interactive Card Details Form
projectdata.description: A work-in-progress interactive card details form, developed as part of a team of three, built to closely match a given design. This project focuses on form validation, real-time card detail updates, and responsive design.

projectdata.name: Portfolio Page
projectdata.description: Details for my portfolio website, built using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

projectdata.name: Email Client Project
projectdata.description: This was a team project to create a web based email client where emails are fetched and displayed from an API. The user can open a modal to compose and send a new email which posts to the API and appears in the sent folder.
